metadata.title: khanka Hard Travel Case Replacement for Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Plus Bluetooth Speaker
features: Sleek design, a case designed for bose soundlink revolve plus, fits perfectly. You can put the revolve plus speaker in a hard case specially designed for the bose revolve plus for easy portability when you go out.

This bose soundlink revolve+ hard case, the interior is made of high quality velvet, the soft inner structure ensures the protection of the bose revolve plus 2. The bose soundlink revolve plus speaker has a hard case with a mesh design on one side to store your bose revolve plus charging accessories and soft storage on the other side for your bose soundlink revolve plus speaker.

This bose soundlink revolve plus wireless speaker system hard shell case is made of high quality EVA material, which is shockproof, dustproof and waterproof, it can protect your bose revolve plus from shocks and splashes when you go out to carry. Put the bose soundlink revolve plus in the box after using the revolve plus speaker at home to prevent the bose revolve plus from accumulating dust.

This hard case designed for bose soundlink revolve+ keeps your bose revolve plus 2 safe, convenient and lightweight. The classic zipper design makes it easy to open and close. This bose revolve case can better protect your device. It is very practical and convenient.

This hard case designed for soundlink revolve plus is very easy to carry and use. Whether you're at work or at home, just unzip the hard case and take out the bose soundlink revolve plus wireless speaker system and you're ready to go anywhere. The long-term protection of the device by the case also greatly extends the life of the bose soundlink revolve plus (note: only the case is sold, bose soundlink revolve plus speaker and accessories are not included).
description: Khanka Hard Travel Case Replacement for Bose SoundLink Revolve+ Plus Bluetooth Speaker
